img_above_text:
## Bonevault
Return back to the village area where the Scorpion Prince was, and head down to the bottom to find the pathway where a Grasshopper Guai patrols.
img_below_text:
As you pass under the bridge, watch for a Puppet Spider to drop from above, and be sure to look along the left wall to notice its actually a row of hanging cocoons.
![Wukong MiddleHollow 31.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/0f/Wukong_MiddleHollow_31.jpg)

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing a dark, web-filled area with large hanging cocoons. The character in the image is holding a torch and appears to be exploring this eerie environment. This image is part of a walkthrough, illustrating the section where players need to be cautious of a Puppet Spider dropping from above and to observe the hanging cocoons along the left wall.
